5D23008C.Line1.B79B1: We can always use a strong back. Eh, but your talents would be wasted swingin' a hammer here in town.

910BF390.Line5.B79B1: Lotta folks around here would feel better with someone like you keeping those bastards in line.

F7177A0E.Line3.B79B1: Truthfully... I've been hoping to visit my sister and her newborn up in Braestaig, but the roads are too dangerous. Damned cutpurses lying in wait at every turn.
